name: UX Case Study Portfolio Layout Guide
description:
Hello guys,

I have been working on this case study template for a while, when it's came to UX guide I want to be more detail and bringing all steps in the process to one template so you can check out easily. 


It's not mean that you have to do all this step, it's actually depend on what you want and need for your case study.


Hope you guys enjoy it and don't hesitate to let me know what you think in the comments below.

--> Feel free to contact me for awesome project.
